member.name: M:KeeWa.DepartementWindow.BT_Sauv_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: It is openened when the user click on the Save button This function acts in 2 ways : If CB_Modif is disactevated (were creating a new Department) it will create a new department and link the contact to it IF CB_Modif is activated (were modifieng a Department) it will apdaute the department that is selected in CB_Modif and delete and recreate the link with the contact
